thread.title: Louis Tomlinson and Simon Cowell Are Trying to Put a Girl Band Together
thread.title_full: Louis Tomlinson and Simon Cowell Are Trying to Put a Girl Band Together

title: Louis Tomlinson and Simon Cowell Are Trying to Put a Girl Band Together
text:
Louis Tomlinson and Simon Cowell Are ''Trying to Put a Girl Band Together'' 
E online Saturday 24th October, 2015 
on a new music label! No, stop freaking out. Tomlinson isn't out here trying to go solo and leave the band for good. He's actually working with Cowell to help put together a new girl group."I've got a little label in print so I'm trying to work with that at the moment. I'm lucky enough to be working with Simon. We've got a few different projects going on at the moment one of which is we're trying to put a girl band together," Tomlinson shared."'It's really exciting to be involved in the different side of it, the background." 
...
